name: Diorama - Simplified Earth
description:
An attempt to replicate this: https://3docean.net/item/low-poly-earth/11609966?ref=Narga&clickthrough_id=961541675&redirect_back=true

Useful Resources

For the actual data used, I used height maps and a water mask provided by: https://www.shadedrelief.com/natural3/pages/extra.html

This video by Sebastian Lague was helpful for framing how to approach this.

The sound effects were downloaded from https://www.zapsplat.com/
